text: Activities must restore degraded forestlands and demonstrate additionality using Tool 01 or equivalent.
title: Activities must restore degraded forestlands and demonstrate additionality using Tool 01 or equivalent.
when: Project lands classified as degraded prior to start.
Alternative land-use scenario demonstrates lower carbon sequestration.
rule: Activities must restore degraded forestlands and demonstrate additionality using Tool 01 or equivalent.

text: Baseline net GHG removals derived from historical land-use data and validated management practices.
title: Baseline net GHG removals derived from historical land-use data and validated management practices.
when: Baseline scenario documentation provided for DOE review.
Land-use maps consistent with national inventory data.
rule: Baseline net GHG removals derived from historical land-use data and validated management practices.

text: Project emissions include fossil fuel use, biomass burning, and fertilizer application as per Tool 08.
title: Project emissions include fossil fuel use, biomass burning, and fertilizer application as per Tool 08.
when: Fuel consumption logged with calibrated meters.
Fertilizer application records preserved for verification.
rule: Project emissions include fossil fuel use, biomass burning, and fertilizer application as per Tool 08.

text: Leakage from wood product displacement addressed using standardized factors in Tool 14.
title: Leakage from wood product displacement addressed using standardized factors in Tool 14.
when: Leakage monitoring includes community engagement.
Mitigation measures documented in monitoring report.
rule: Leakage from wood product displacement addressed using standardized factors in Tool 14.

text: Permanent plots re-measured at least every five years with QA/QC according to Tool 16.
title: Permanent plots re-measured at least every five years with QA/QC according to Tool 16.
when: Sample plot network georeferenced and maintained.
Remote sensing imagery archived for DOE review.
rule: Permanent plots re-measured at least every five years with QA/QC according to Tool 16.

text: Combined sampling uncertainty must remain below 10% at 90% confidence or be conservatively adjusted.
title: Combined sampling uncertainty must remain below 10% at 90% confidence or be conservatively adjusted.
when: Variance analysis submitted with monitoring report.
DOE reviews recalculated confidence intervals.
rule: Combined sampling uncertainty must remain below 10% at 90% confidence or be conservatively adjusted.

text: Monitoring reports contain geospatial data, field measurements, emission sources, and buffer contributions.
title: Monitoring reports contain geospatial data, field measurements, emission sources, and buffer contributions.
when: All datasets version-controlled and auditable.
DOE verifies completeness of supporting documentation.
rule: Monitoring reports contain geospatial data, field measurements, emission sources, and buffer contributions.

text: Non-permanence buffer share determined via Tool 15 and recorded in registry accounts.
title: Non-permanence buffer share determined via Tool 15 and recorded in registry accounts.
when: Buffer contribution documented alongside issuance request.
Risk assessment approved by DOE.
rule: Non-permanence buffer share determined via Tool 15 and recorded in registry accounts.

text: Projects must reforest lands without forest cover since 31 December 1989 and comply with national definitions.
title: Projects must reforest lands without forest cover since 31 December 1989 and comply with national definitions.
when: Project lands classified as non-forest for at least 10 years prior to start date.
Title documents demonstrate right to implement A/R activities.
rule: Projects must reforest lands without forest cover since 31 December 1989 and comply with national definitions.

text: Baseline biomass is determined using IPCC default factors or site-specific sampling following Tool 02 guidance.
title: Baseline biomass is determined using IPCC default factors or site-specific sampling following Tool 02 guidance.
when: Sampling plans approved by DOE.
IPCC Tier 2 defaults are justified in monitoring report.
rule: Baseline biomass is determined using IPCC default factors or site-specific sampling following Tool 02 guidance.

text: Net anthropogenic GHG removals equal project removals minus baseline emissions and leakage.
title: Net anthropogenic GHG removals equal project removals minus baseline emissions and leakage.
when: All carbon pools accounted for unless exclusion justified.
Leakage deduction applied before reporting net removal.
rule: Net anthropogenic GHG removals equal project removals minus baseline emissions and leakage.

text: Activity shifting leakage is quantified using Tool 14 and discounted from net removals.
title: Activity shifting leakage is quantified using Tool 14 and discounted from net removals.
when: Community livelihoods impacted by land-use change.
Leakage mitigation plan implemented with monitoring indicators.
rule: Activity shifting leakage is quantified using Tool 14 and discounted from net removals.

text: Field measurements of biomass stock changes occur at least every five years with permanent plots.
title: Field measurements of biomass stock changes occur at least every five years with permanent plots.
when: Monitoring plan approved during validation.
Permanent sample plots accessible throughout crediting period.
rule: Field measurements of biomass stock changes occur at least every five years with permanent plots.

text: If sampling uncertainty exceeds 10%, apply Tool 12 to derive conservative estimates.
title: If sampling uncertainty exceeds 10%, apply Tool 12 to derive conservative estimates.
when: Confidence interval wider than ±10%.
DOE reviews uncertainty calculation worksheets.
rule: If sampling uncertainty exceeds 10%, apply Tool 12 to derive conservative estimates.

text: Monitoring reports include maps, inventory data, leakage deductions, and QA/QC evidence.
title: Monitoring reports include maps, inventory data, leakage deductions, and QA/QC evidence.
when: Reporting aligns with UNFCCC template requirements.
All supporting datasets archived with version history.
rule: Monitoring reports include maps, inventory data, leakage deductions, and QA/QC evidence.

text: Non-permanence risk must be addressed through buffer contributions consistent with Tool 15 guidance.
title: Non-permanence risk must be addressed through buffer contributions consistent with Tool 15 guidance.
when: Non-permanence risk assessment completed prior to credit issuance.
Buffer contributions recorded in registry records.
rule: Non-permanence risk must be addressed through buffer contributions consistent with Tool 15 guidance.

text: ELIGIBLE if all predicates true; otherwise INELIGIBLE.
title: ELIGIBLE if all predicates true; otherwise INELIGIBLE.
when: Activity is small-scale A/R on lands other than wetlands
Lands meet national forest definition thresholds when project matures
Baseline land-use and legal eligibility documented
rule: ELIGIBLE if all predicates true; otherwise INELIGIBLE.

text: If a pool is excluded from boundary, set its ΔCO2e := 0 by rule.
title: If a pool is excluded from boundary, set its ΔCO2e := 0 by rule.
when: Optional pools (DOM, Litter, SOC) excluded via boundary selection
rule: If a pool is excluded from boundary, set its ΔCO2e := 0 by rule.

text: If ShrubCrownCover_i <= 0.05 then ΔC_shrubs_i := 0.
title: If ShrubCrownCover_i <= 0.05 then ΔC_shrubs_i := 0.
when: Zeroing conditions for shrubs stratum defined by crown cover
rule: If ShrubCrownCover_i <= 0.05 then ΔC_shrubs_i := 0.

text: Net_project = (dCO2e_AGB + dCO2e_BGB + dCO2e_DOM + dCO2e_Litter + dCO2e_SOC) - leakage
title: Net_project = (dCO2e_AGB + dCO2e_BGB + dCO2e_DOM + dCO2e_Litter + dCO2e_SOC) - leakage
when: Annual net GHG removals (project)
rule: Net_project = (dCO2e_AGB + dCO2e_BGB + dCO2e_DOM + dCO2e_Litter + dCO2e_SOC) - leakage

text: leakage = L_AS + L_MD
title: leakage = L_AS + L_MD
when: Leakage must be accounted per methodology/tool
rule: leakage = L_AS + L_MD

text: Revisit plots every RevisitInterval years using consistent mensuration protocol.
title: Revisit plots every RevisitInterval years using consistent mensuration protocol.
when: Permanent sample plots established per design
rule: Revisit plots every RevisitInterval years using consistent mensuration protocol.

text: Maintain SOPs and QA/QC per national inventory guidance or IPCC GPG; record all monitored parameters at each verification.
title: Maintain SOPs and QA/QC per national inventory guidance or IPCC GPG; record all monitored parameters at each verification.
when: Data and parameters recorded per methodology
rule: Maintain SOPs and QA/QC per national inventory guidance or IPCC GPG; record all monitored parameters at each verification.

text: Default CF = 0.47 t C per t d.m. (trees and shrubs).
title: Default CF = 0.47 t C per t d.m. (trees and shrubs).
when: Carbon fraction for aboveground and shrub biomass required
rule: Default CF = 0.47 t C per t d.m. (trees and shrubs).

text: RSR_trees = 0.25; RSR_shrubs = 0.40 (dimensionless).
title: RSR_trees = 0.25; RSR_shrubs = 0.40 (dimensionless).
when: Root:shoot ratio required for trees and shrubs
rule: RSR_trees = 0.25; RSR_shrubs = 0.40 (dimensionless).

text: C_AGB_t = AGB_dm * CF
title: C_AGB_t = AGB_dm * CF
when: Compute carbon in AGB at time t
rule: C_AGB_t = AGB_dm * CF

text: If RelativePrecision > 10 then apply uncertainty discount per U-table.
title: If RelativePrecision > 10 then apply uncertainty discount per U-table.
when: Precision check for sampling strata (trees/shrubs)
rule: If RelativePrecision > 10 then apply uncertainty discount per U-table.

text: CO2e_pool = C_pool * 44/12
title: CO2e_pool = C_pool * 44/12
when: Convert carbon to CO2e
rule: CO2e_pool = C_pool * 44/12

text: ΔC_year = (C_t2 - C_t1) / T
title: ΔC_year = (C_t2 - C_t1) / T
when: Annual change by linear interpolation between verifications
rule: ΔC_year = (C_t2 - C_t1) / T

text: ELIGIBLE if all predicates true; otherwise INELIGIBLE.
title: ELIGIBLE if all predicates true; otherwise INELIGIBLE.
when: Activity is small-scale A/R on lands other than wetlands
Lands meet national forest definition thresholds when project matures
Baseline land-use and legal eligibility documented
rule: ELIGIBLE if all predicates true; otherwise INELIGIBLE.

text: If a pool is excluded from boundary, set its ΔCO2e := 0 by rule.
title: If a pool is excluded from boundary, set its ΔCO2e := 0 by rule.
when: Optional pools (DOM, Litter, SOC) excluded via boundary selection
rule: If a pool is excluded from boundary, set its ΔCO2e := 0 by rule.

text: If ShrubCrownCover_i <= 0.05 then ΔC_shrubs_i := 0.
title: If ShrubCrownCover_i <= 0.05 then ΔC_shrubs_i := 0.
when: Zeroing conditions for shrubs stratum defined by crown cover
rule: If ShrubCrownCover_i <= 0.05 then ΔC_shrubs_i := 0.

text: Net_project = (dCO2e_AGB + dCO2e_BGB + dCO2e_DOM + dCO2e_Litter + dCO2e_SOC) - leakage
title: Net_project = (dCO2e_AGB + dCO2e_BGB + dCO2e_DOM + dCO2e_Litter + dCO2e_SOC) - leakage
when: Annual net GHG removals (project)
rule: Net_project = (dCO2e_AGB + dCO2e_BGB + dCO2e_DOM + dCO2e_Litter + dCO2e_SOC) - leakage

text: leakage = L_AS + L_MD
title: leakage = L_AS + L_MD
when: Leakage must be accounted per methodology/tool
rule: leakage = L_AS + L_MD

text: Revisit plots every RevisitInterval years using consistent mensuration protocol.
title: Revisit plots every RevisitInterval years using consistent mensuration protocol.
when: Permanent sample plots established per design
rule: Revisit plots every RevisitInterval years using consistent mensuration protocol.

text: Maintain SOPs and QA/QC per national inventory guidance or IPCC GPG; record all monitored parameters at each verification.
title: Maintain SOPs and QA/QC per national inventory guidance or IPCC GPG; record all monitored parameters at each verification.
when: Data and parameters recorded per methodology
rule: Maintain SOPs and QA/QC per national inventory guidance or IPCC GPG; record all monitored parameters at each verification.

title: Default CF = 0.47 t C per t d.m. (trees and shrubs).
when: Carbon fraction for aboveground and shrub biomass required
rule: Default CF = 0.47 t C per t d.m. (trees and shrubs).

text: RSR_trees = 0.25; RSR_shrubs = 0.40 (dimensionless).
title: RSR_trees = 0.25; RSR_shrubs = 0.40 (dimensionless).
when: Root:shoot ratio required for trees and shrubs
rule: RSR_trees = 0.25; RSR_shrubs = 0.40 (dimensionless).

text: C_AGB_t = AGB_dm * CF
title: C_AGB_t = AGB_dm * CF
when: Compute carbon in AGB at time t
rule: C_AGB_t = AGB_dm * CF

text: If RelativePrecision > 10 then apply uncertainty discount per U-table.
title: If RelativePrecision > 10 then apply uncertainty discount per U-table.
when: Precision check for sampling strata (trees/shrubs)
rule: If RelativePrecision > 10 then apply uncertainty discount per U-table.

text: CO2e_pool = C_pool * 44/12
title: CO2e_pool = C_pool * 44/12
when: Convert carbon to CO2e
rule: CO2e_pool = C_pool * 44/12

text: ΔC_year = (C_t2 - C_t1) / T
title: ΔC_year = (C_t2 - C_t1) / T
when: Annual change by linear interpolation between verifications
rule: ΔC_year = (C_t2 - C_t1) / T
